title: Best ad campaigns worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of points for 10 number of Campaign/Brand (Agency)s.

Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) has the highest Number of points and Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) has the lowest Number of points.

The maximum Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) has got 1.71 times higher Number of points than the minimum Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Campaign/Brand (Agency) in the x axis and Number of points in the y axis.

Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) has the highest Number of points and Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) has the lowest Number of points.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Campaign/Brand (Agency), and Number of points in each Campaign/Brand (Agency) on the y axis.

The Number of points is appeared to be the highest at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and lowest at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York).

Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) has 1.71 times more Number of points than Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) which is has the lowest.

Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) is higher than any other Campaign/Brand (Agency)s with value 75.2, followed by , and India's Newest Status Symbol / Harpic (McCann New Delhi). Down to Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) with the lowest value 44.0.
The Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) tends to be 1.32 percent lower than average.
The Number of points is 569.2 if we add up values of all Campaign/Brand (Agency)s.
